20101229020608.000|20101229020610.000|CC1|AIRPORTS SPILLED OVER TO GROUND

20101229020611.000|20101229020612.000|CC1|CITY, WHERE CARS AND BUSES WERE 
20101229020612.000|20101229020614.000|CC1|BURIED.                         
20101229020614.000|20101229020615.000|CC1|>> IN THE PAST, WE'VE HAD HELP  
20101229020615.000|20101229020617.000|CC1|FROM AIRPORTS WITH EQUIPMENT.   
20101229020617.000|20101229020618.000|CC1|BUT NOT THIS TIME.

20101229020625.000|20101229020626.000|CC1|AVAILABLE TO US TO WORK ON THE  
20101229020626.000|20101229020627.000|CC1|STREETS.                        
20101229020627.000|20101229020628.000|CC1|>> Ifill: BUT THAT COULD BE A   
20101229020628.000|20101229020630.000|CC1|WHILE, BOTH FOR THE PLOW CREWS  
20101229020630.000|20101229020631.000|CC1|SLOGGING AWAY AT THE AIRPORTS   
20101229020631.000|20101229020633.000|CC1|AND THE TIRED CROWDS HOPING FOR 
20101229020633.000|20101229020638.000|CC1|RELIEF AND A WAY HOME.          
20101229020638.000|20101229020639.000|CC1|SO HOW IS IT THAT A TWO-DAY-OLD 
20101229020639.000|20101229020641.000|CC1|EAST COAST BLIZZARD IS STILL    
20101229020641.000|20101229020642.000|CC1|MANAGING TO TANGLE AIR TRAVEL   
20101229020642.000|20101229020644.000|CC1|TONIGHT?                        
20101229020644.000|20101229020646.000|CC1|BEN MUTZABAUGH COVERS THE       
20101229020646.000|20101229020647.000|CC1|AVIATION INDUSTRY FOR "U.S.A.

20101229020648.000|20101229020652.000|CC1|"TODAY IN THE SKY."

20101229021859.000|20101229021900.000|CC1|SELLING MILITARY EQUIPMENT      
20101229021900.000|20101229021902.000|CC1|WHICH MIGHT EVEN INVOLVE SOME   
20101229021902.000|20101229021904.000|CC1|SELECT DEPLOYMENTS OF SPECIAL   
20101229021904.000|20101229021906.000|CC1|OPERATION FORCES TO GO AGAINST  
20101229021906.000|20101229021906.000|CC1|TERRORIST THREATS.              
20101229021906.000|20101229021908.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, THE PREVIOUS          
20101229021908.000|20101229021910.000|CC1|MINISTER OF DEFENSE IN IRAQ     
20101229021910.000|20101229021912.000|CC1|TALKED ABOUT REQUIRING          
20101229021912.000|20101229021915.000|CC1|AMERICAN MILITARY HELP TO       
20101229021915.000|20101229021916.000|CC1|2016.                           
20101229021916.000|20101229021917.000|CC1|AND BEYOND.                     
20101229021917.000|20101229021920.000|CC1|BECAUSE WHAT IRAQ CAN DO NOW    
20101229021920.000|20101229021922.000|CC1|WITH CONTEND WITH MILITIAS.     
20101229021922.000|20101229021924.000|CC1|IT CAN'T PROVIDE FOR ITS        
20101229021924.000|20101229021925.000|CC1|EXTERNAL DEFENSE.

20101229021928.000|20101229021929.000|CC1|WITH AMERICAN AIRCRAFT.         
20101229021929.000|20101229021930.000|CC1|WHEN YOU PUT THAT INTO THE      
20101229021930.000|20101229021931.000|CC1|EQUATION I THINK IT SUGGESTS

20101229021938.000|20101229021940.000|CC1|TURN THE UNITED STATES.         
20101229021940.000|20101229021941.000|CC1|>> Warner: HOW WITH THAT JIBE   
20101229021941.000|20101229021942.000|CC1|WITH THE POLITICAL PRESSURES

20101229022033.000|20101229022035.000|CC1|THIS NEW GOVERNMENT FINALLY.    
20101229022035.000|20101229022038.000|CC1|HOW STABLE IS IT?               
20101229022038.000|20101229022041.000|CC1|HOW EQUIPPED IS IT TO DEAL

20101229022521.000|20101229022521.000|CC1|LIMIT.                          
20101229022521.000|20101229022523.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AS OF SEPTEMBER,   
20101229022523.000|20101229022525.000|CC1|THE HEALTH CARE REFORM LAW DID  
20101229022525.000|20101229022526.000|CC1|AWAY WITH THOSE LIMITS, AND     
20101229022526.000|20101229022528.000|CC1|VIOLET'S BILLS WILL BE PAID AS  
20101229022528.000|20101229022529.000|CC1|LONG AS SHE REMAINS ON HER      
20101229022529.000|20101229022531.000|CC1|FAMILY'S POLICY.                
20101229022531.000|20101229022533.000|CC1|>> SHE'S NOT GOING TO DIE       
20101229022533.000|20101229022534.000|CC1|BECAUSE WE CAN'T AFFORD THE     
20101229022534.000|20101229022535.000|CC1|MEDICINE.                       
20101229022535.000|20101229022536.000|CC1|SO IT'S HUGE.                   
20101229022536.000|20101229022538.000|CC1|IT MEANS HER LIFE.              
20101229022538.000|20101229022543.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ANOTHER PROVISION  
20101229022543.000|20101229022543.000|CC1|OF THE FEDERAL LAW WHICH IS     
20101229022543.000|20101229022544.000|CC1|ALREADY IN EFFECT BARS INSURANCE
20101229022544.000|20101229022545.000|CC1|COMPANIES FROM DENYING CHILDREN 
20101229022545.000|20101229022545.000|CC1|COVERAGE BECAUSE OF PRE-EXISTING
20101229022545.000|20101229022548.000|CC1|CONDITIONS.                     
20101229022548.000|20101229022550.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA TAKES THAT IDEA A    
20101229022550.000|20101229022552.000|CC1|STEP FURTHER, SAYS ANTHONY      
20101229022552.000|20101229022554.000|CC1|WRIGHT, A CONSUMER ADVOCATE.    
20101229022554.000|20101229022555.000|CC1|>> WHEN THE FEDERAL LAW SAID YOU
20101229022555.000|20101229022557.000|CC1|HAVE TO TAKE CHILDREN WITH      
20101229022557.000|20101229022558.000|CC1|PREEXISTING CONDITIONS AND SOME 
20101229022558.000|20101229022559.000|CC1|INSURERS DECIDED, "WELL, THEN,  
20101229022559.000|20101229022602.000|CC1|WE'RE NOT GOING TO COVER        
20101229022602.000|20101229022603.000|CC1|CHILDREN, PERIOD," YOU KNOW,    
20101229022603.000|20101229022604.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA CAME UP AND SAID,    
20101229022604.000|20101229022605.000|CC1|"WELL, IF YOU DON'T COVER       
20101229022605.000|20101229022606.000|CC1|CHILDREN, THEN YOU'RE NOT GOING 
20101229022606.000|20101229022608.000|CC1|TO BE ALLOWED TO SELL INSURANCE,
20101229022608.000|20101229022610.000|CC1|PERIOD, FOR OVER FIVE YEARS,"   
20101229022610.000|20101229022611.000|CC1|AND THAT... THAT'S GOING TO     
20101229022611.000|20101229022612.000|CC1|BRING INSURERS BACK INTO THE    
20101229022612.000|20101229022613.000|CC1|MARKET.                         
20101229022613.000|20101229022614.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND FOR ADULTS WITH
20101229022614.000|20101229022617.000|CC1|PRE-EXISTING CONDITIONS,        
20101229022617.000|20101229022618.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA IS GETTING THE JUMP  
20101229022618.000|20101229022620.000|CC1|ON THE FEDERAL LAW BY PROVIDING 
20101229022620.000|20101229022621.000|CC1|ACCESS TO COVERAGE FOUR YEARS   
20101229022621.000|20101229022621.000|CC1|BEFORE THE NATIONAL LAW KICKS   
20101229022621.000|20101229022625.000|CC1|IN.                             
20101229022625.000|20101229022627.000|CC1|MOVING AHEAD OF MOST OTHER      
20101229022627.000|20101229022628.000|CC1|STATES, CALIFORNIA IS ALREADY   
20101229022628.000|20101229022630.000|CC1|SETTING UP A HEALTH BENEFIT     
20101229022630.000|20101229022632.000|CC1|EXCHANGE WHERE CONSUMERS AND    
20101229022632.000|20101229022633.000|CC1|SMALL BUSINESSES CAN SHOP FOR   
20101229022633.000|20101229022635.000|CC1|AFFORDABLE HEALTH INSURANCE     
20101229022635.000|20101229022636.000|CC1|AMONG COMPETING INSURANCE       
20101229022636.000|20101229022640.000|CC1|COMPANIES STARTING IN 2014.     
20101229022640.000|20101229022641.000|CC1|>> IN CALIFORNIA, WE ARE THE    
20101229022641.000|20101229022643.000|CC1|FIRST STATE IN THE NATION THAT  
20101229022643.000|20101229022644.000|CC1|HAS ESTABLISHED A LAW FOR A     
20101229022644.000|20101229022645.000|CC1|HEALTH BENEFIT EXCHANGE UNDER   
20101229022645.000|20101229022648.000|CC1|THE NEW FEDERAL RULES.          
20101229022648.000|20101229022649.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ALTHOUGH ENACTMENT 
20101229022649.000|20101229022651.000|CC1|OF THE LAW WAS BIPARTISAN, SOME 
20101229022651.000|20101229022653.000|CC1|CRITICS OF REFORM, LIKE JOHN    
20101229022653.000|20101229022655.000|CC1|GRAHAM AT THE CONSERVATIVE THINK
20101229022655.000|20101229022656.000|CC1|TANK PACIFIC RESEARCH INSTITUTE,
20101229022656.000|20101229022659.000|CC1|WORRY THE EXCHANGE WILL BE      
20101229022659.000|20101229022700.000|CC1|POLITICIZED AND WILL ACTUALLY   
20101229022700.000|20101229022703.000|CC1|LIMIT CONSUMER CHOICE.          
20101229022703.000|20101229022704.000|CC1|>> WHAT IT DOES IS, IT ALLOWS   
20101229022704.000|20101229022706.000|CC1|THE LEGISLATURE TO APPOINT FIVE 
20101229022706.000|20101229022709.000|CC1|POLITICAL APPOINTEES ONTO A     
20101229022709.000|20101229022714.000|CC1|BOARD THAT WILL DECIDE WHAT     
20101229022714.000|20101229022714.000|CC1|HEALTH PLAN YOU CAN GET.        
20101229022714.000|20101229022715.000|CC1|AND THAT REALLY DRAMATICALLY    
20101229022715.000|20101229022716.000|CC1|REDUCES CHOICE.                 
20101229022716.000|20101229022717.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT PEOPLE APPLYING
20101229022717.000|20101229022719.000|CC1|FOR GOVERNMENT-PAID HEALTH CARE 
20101229022719.000|20101229022720.000|CC1|MAY BE MOST AFFECTED BY         
20101229022720.000|20101229022722.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA'S EFFORTS TO         
20101229022722.000|20101229022728.000|CC1|IMPLEMENT REFORM.               
20101229022728.000|20101229022728.000|CC1|>> IN ORDER FOR YOU TO BE       
20101229022728.000|20101229022729.000|CC1|ELIGIBLE, THESE ARE SOME OF     
20101229022729.000|20101229022734.000|CC1|THE REQUIREMENTS.               
20101229022734.000|20101229022735.000|CC1|>> Reporter: A MAJOR EXPANSION  
20101229022735.000|20101229022735.000|CC1|OF MEDICAID, WHICH PROVIDES     
20101229022735.000|20101229022736.000|CC1|HEALTH CARE FOR LOW INCOME

20101229022737.000|20101229022738.000|CC1|DECREASING THE RANKS OF THE     
20101229022738.000|20101229022738.000|CC1|UNINSURED.

20101229022739.000|20101229022740.000|CC1|BILLION FROM THE FEDERAL        
20101229022740.000|20101229022741.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT IN THE FORM OF A     
20101229022741.000|20101229022743.000|CC1|WAIVER TO BEGIN THAT EXPANSION, 
20101229022743.000|20101229022744.000|CC1|WHICH IS EXPECTED TO ADD THREE  
20101229022744.000|20101229022746.000|CC1|MILLION TO FOUR MILLION PEOPLE  
20101229022746.000|20101229022746.000|CC1|TO THE STATE'S MEDICAID ROLLS BY
20101229022746.000|20101229022751.000|CC1|2014.                           
20101229022751.000|20101229022752.000|CC1|IN AREAS LIKE CALIFORNIA'S      
20101229022752.000|20101229022754.000|CC1|CENTRAL VALLEY, WHERE           
20101229022754.000|20101229022756.000|CC1|AGRICULTURE IS THE DOMINANT     
20101229022756.000|20101229022757.000|CC1|INDUSTRY AND UNEMPLOYMENT HOVERS
20101229022757.000|20101229022758.000|CC1|AROUND 15%, MEDICAID EXPANSION  
20101229022758.000|20101229022802.000|CC1|COULD HAVE A HUGE IMPACT.       
20101229022802.000|20101229022804.000|CC1|IT COULD MEAN AN INCREASED LOAD 
20101229022804.000|20101229022806.000|CC1|FOR COMMUNITY HEALTH CENTERS

20101229022809.000|20101229022810.000|CC1|FRESNO, WHICH TREAT MEDICAID AND
20101229022810.000|20101229022811.000|CC1|UNINSURED PATIENTS, MANY OF WHOM
20101229022811.000|20101229022814.000|CC1|PRIVATE DOCTORS REJECT.         
20101229022814.000|20101229022816.000|CC1|STEPHEN SCHILLING, ITS DIRECTOR,
20101229022816.000|20101229022817.000|CC1|SEES THE CHANGES AS A MIXED

20101229022820.000|20101229022821.000|CC1|OUR ABILITY TO MEET AN INCREASED
20101229022821.000|20101229022824.000|CC1|DEMAND.                         
20101229022824.000|20101229022825.000|CC1|WE'RE ALREADY PRETTY WELL

20101229022948.000|20101229022950.000|CC1|WHICH COVERED ALMOST 90% OF MY

20101229022957.000|20101229022958.000|CC1|CLOSE MY DOORS, AND EVENTUALLY  
20101229022958.000|20101229022959.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT HAPPENED.           
20101229022959.000|20101229023001.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HALDERMAN, A       
20101229023001.000|20101229023001.000|CC1|REPUBLICAN, LEFT HER MEDICAL

20101229023052.000|20101229023055.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA.

20101229023112.000|20101229023113.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BY 2014, HE        
20101229023113.000|20101229023116.000|CC1|PROBABLY WILL BE ELIGIBLE.

20101229023131.000|20101229023132.000|CC1|MAKE UP THE DIFFERENCE SINCE

20101229023136.000|20101229023137.000|CC1|BUT ADMINISTRATORS COMPLAIN THAT

20101229023137.000|20101229023139.000|CC1|BUSINESS.

20101229023146.000|20101229023150.000|CC1|COSTA JUST SURVIVED A TOUGH

20101229023150.000|20101229023151.000|CC1|FOR HEALTHCARE REFORM COST HIM  
20101229023151.000|20101229023153.000|CC1|SOME SUPPORT.

20101229023156.000|20101229023157.000|CC1|LINE, DEFENDING PARTS OF IT     
20101229023157.000|20101229023200.000|CC1|WHILE PROMISING CHANGES.        
20101229023200.000|20101229023202.000|CC1|>> THERE ARE A LOT OF ELEMENTS  
20101229023202.000|20101229023204.000|CC1|OF THIS LAW THAT ARE GOING TO BE
20101229023204.000|20101229023205.000|CC1|IMPLEMENTED OVER THE NEXT TWO,  
20101229023205.000|20101229023209.000|CC1|FOUR AND SIX YEARS.             
20101229023209.000|20101229023210.000|CC1|AND THERE WILL BE CHANGES WITH  
20101229023210.000|20101229023216.000|CC1|THE REPUBLICAN CONGRESS, AND    
20101229023216.000|20101229023216.000|CC1|THERE WILL BE CHANGES WITH... AS
20101229023216.000|20101229023217.000|CC1|WE TRY TO SEE WHAT'S WORKING AND
20101229023217.000|20101229023218.000|CC1|WHAT'S NOT WORKING.             
20101229023218.000|20101229023219.000|CC1|>> Reporter: CONSUMER ADVOCATE  
20101229023219.000|20101229023220.000|CC1|ANTHONY WRIGHT ARGUES THAT      
20101229023220.000|20101229023221.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA HAS TO MAKE REFORM   
20101229023221.000|20101229023224.000|CC1|WORK, ESPECIALLY NOW.           
20101229023224.000|20101229023229.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE A BUDGET CRISIS THAT 
20101229023229.000|20101229023230.000|CC1|IS... IS POTENTIALLY FORCING    
20101229023230.000|20101229023230.000|CC1|ADDITIONAL CUTS TO OUR

20101229023832.000|20101229023834.000|CC1|OF CAMPAIGNS, WE HAVE REAL

20101229023838.000|20101229023840.000|CC1|PUSH IN THAT DIRECTION.         
20101229023840.000|20101229023841.000|CC1|WE DID MAKE THE EFFORT IN THE   
20101229023841.000|20101229023842.000|CC1|LAST COUPLE OF YEARS.

20101229024446.000|20101229024448.000|CC1|27th.                           
20101229024448.000|20101229024449.000|CC1|SO HOW CAN IT BE UNDER REVIEW?"

20101229025129.000|20101229025129.000|CC1|WITH.                           
20101229025129.000|20101229025130.000|CC1|>> YOU HAVE A DISCREPANCY       
20101229025130.000|20101229025131.000|CC1|BETWEEN WHAT THE CUSTOMER STATED
20101229025131.000|20101229025131.000|CC1|UP FRONT AND WHAT WE WERE ABLE  
20101229025131.000|20101229025133.000|CC1|TO VERIFY IN THOSE DOCUMENTS.   
20101229025133.000|20101229025137.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WE RELAYED THE     
20101229025137.000|20101229025146.000|CC1|RESPONSE TO LORRAINE, AWAITING  
20101229025146.000|20101229025147.000|CC1|FOR FORECLOSURE, DON MADDEN     
20101229025147.000|20101229025148.000|CC1|REJECTED FOR HAMP.              
20101229025148.000|20101229025150.000|CC1|BOTH VEHEMENTLY DENIED THE      
20101229025150.000|20101229025151.000|CC1|BANK'S CLAIM, SAYING THEY CAN   
20101229025151.000|20101229025152.000|CC1|PROVE THEY SUBMITTED EVERYTHING 
20101229025152.000|20101229025152.000|CC1|IN PRINT RIGHT AWAY, ACCURATELY.
20101229025152.000|20101229025153.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY.                  
20101229025153.000|20101229025153.000|CC1|I HAVE THE PAPERWORK RIGHT HERE.
20101229025153.000|20101229025154.000|CC1|>> Reporter: LAST WEEK, BANK OF 
20101229025154.000|20101229025155.000|CC1|AMERICA TOLD MADDEN HIS MORTGAGE
20101229025155.000|20101229025157.000|CC1|HAD BEEN LOWERED 40%.

20101229025316.000|20101229025316.000|CC1|THE OCEAN FLOOR.                
20101229025316.000|20101229025322.000|CC1|HERE'S AN EXCERPT.              
20101229025322.000|20101229025324.000|CC1|>> UNLIKE DRILLING THROUGH SEA  
20101229025324.000|20101229025325.000|CC1|ICE, WHICH IS JUST 26 FEET      
20101229025325.000|20101229025328.000|CC1|THICK, THE ICE SHELF HERE IS    
20101229025328.000|20101229025330.000|CC1|400 FEET.                       
20101229025330.000|20101229025331.000|CC1|>> WE'RE LOOKING AT LEAST       
20101229025331.000|20101229025334.000|CC1|DOUBLING OR TRYING TO DOUBLE    
20101229025334.000|20101229025335.000|CC1|THE CAPABILITY BELOW THE SEA    
20101229025335.000|20101229025340.000|CC1|FLOOR AND PENETRATE TO 1,000    
20101229025340.000|20101229025342.000|CC1|METERS INTO THE SEA FLOOR.      
20101229025342.000|20101229025342.000|CC1|>> BUT THAT'S ONLY THE          
20101229025342.000|20101229025343.000|CC1|BEGINNING.                      
20101229025343.000|20101229025345.000|CC1|>> NO ONE HAS EVER DRILLED      
20101229025345.000|20101229025346.000|CC1|THROUGH AN ICE SHELF.           
20101229025346.000|20101229025348.000|CC1|THEY PRESENT THESE CHALLENGES.  
20101229025348.000|20101229025350.000|CC1|THE ICE SHELVES FLOAT UP AND    
20101229025350.000|20101229025351.000|CC1|DOWN WITH THE TIDE SO YOU HAVE  
20101229025351.000|20101229025353.000|CC1|TO DEAL WITH THE VERTICAL       
20101229025353.000|20101229025353.000|CC1|ELEVATION CHANGE.               
20101229025353.000|20101229025355.000|CC1|THEY MOVE SIDE WAYS.            
20101229025355.000|20101229025357.000|CC1|THEY FLOW.                      
20101229025357.000|20101229025358.000|CC1|EVENTUALLY YOUR DRILL PIPE IS   
20101229025358.000|20101229025400.000|CC1|GOING TO GET BENT.              
20101229025400.000|20101229025401.000|CC1|>> CAN THE DRILL BORE THROUGH   
20101229025401.000|20101229025404.000|CC1|A THICK LAYER OF ICE THAT IS    
20101229025404.000|20101229025405.000|CC1|CONSTANTLY MOVING WITHOUT       
20101229025405.000|20101229025406.000|CC1|BREAKING OR GETTING YANGED OUT  
20101229025406.000|20101229025408.000|CC1|OF THE SEA FLOOR?               
20101229025408.000|20101229025410.000|CC1|TO CONFRONT THIS UNIQUE         
20101229025410.000|20101229025413.000|CC1|CHALLENGE HEAD ON, THE TEAM     
20101229025413.000|20101229025414.000|CC1|INVENTS A NEW TOOL.             
20101229025414.000|20101229025416.000|CC1|THE HOT WATER DRILL.            
20101229025416.000|20101229025418.000|CC1|THIS MARVEL OF ENGINEERING IS   
20101229025418.000|20101229025420.000|CC1|A MOVING RING OF HEAT THAT      
20101229025420.000|20101229025422.000|CC1|BLASTS JETS OF STEAMING WATER   
20101229025422.000|20101229025424.000|CC1|TO MELT WIDE HOLES SO THE       
20101229025424.000|20101229025426.000|CC1|DRILL CAN OPERATE FREELY        
20101229025426.000|20101229025427.000|CC1|THROUGH 400 FEET OF SHIFTING    
20101229025427.000|20101229025430.000|CC1|ICE.
